mapper.insert: INSERT INTO slips (user_id, approver_id, status, step, total_amount, created_date, updated_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{approverId}, #{status}, #{step}, #{totalAmount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE slips SET user_id = #{userId}, approver_id = #{approverId}, status = #{status}, step = #{step}, total_amount = #{totalAmount}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.status, s.step, s.total_amount, s.user_id, u.name AS user_name, s.approver_id, s.created_date, s.updated_date FROM slips s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 0;

SELECT s.id, s.status, s.step, s.total_amount, s.user_id, u.name AS user_name, s.approver_id, s.created_date, s.updated_date FROM slips s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id WHERE s.approver_id = #{approverId} AND s.status = 1;
SELECT id, status, step, total_amount, user_id, approver_id, created_date FROM slips WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM slips WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY updated_date DESC
SELECT * FROM slips WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 2 ORDER BY updated_date DESC
